about.title: Hi! I'm Matias Larralde and I'm thrilled that you're taking a look at my Portfolio.
about.sentence1: I came to the tech world with a pretty diversified background that has allowed me to acquire many skills that I apply now to programming.
about.sentence2: This builds my thirst for learning and mastering new technologies; every new day is a new challenge!

booki.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 2
booki.description: This was my first project at OpenClassrooms bootcamp. I turned a mockup into a responsive web page using HTML and CSS, ensuring web semantics, compatibility with major browsers, and code validity with W3C.

sophie-bluel.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 3
sophie-bluel.description: I used JavaScript to implement features such as dynamically fetching and filtering API data. I also integrated a login page and a modal for adding, modifying, and deleting data both on the page and API.

qwenta.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 4
qwenta.description: This project involved planning website development. I wrote technical specifications, researched various technical aspects, and set up a Kanban board for project management.

nina-carducci.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 5
nina-carducci.description: I optimized the website's images, code, and structure. I debugged functionalities, added local SEO and social media integration using meta tags and Schema.org.

kasa.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 6
kasa.description: In this React project, I used React Router for navigation, created React components, added CSS animations with SASS, and implemented a 404 page.

mon-vieux-grimoire.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 7
mon-vieux-grimoire.description: This time, I built an Express server, a RESTful API, set up an authentication system, and implemented secure CRUD operations.

my-portfolio.title: OpenClassrooms - Project 8
my-portfolio.description: My portfolio was my first project without a roadmap. I initialized it with Vite, developed it with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind, and implemented translation with the i18n library.
my-portfolio.website-link: You already are on my portfolio!

pawa.title: PAWA Token
pawa.description: This is the first ERC-20 token I created to learn Solidity. I used Hardhat and OpenZeppelin libraries to build it, and deployed it on the Polygon network using Infura as the RPC node provider.

spacedolphin.title: SpaceDolphin
spacedolphin.description: SpaceDolphin is my second altcoin project. I deployed it on the Base network using Alchemy as the RPC node provider. I also plan to create SpaceDolphin NFTs in the future.

flashloan.title: Flash Loan
flashloan.description: I developed a flash loan arbitrage bot on the Polygon Network using Aave and Ethers.js to exploit price discrepancies across exchanges. I created a flash loan contract and scripts to detect arbitrage opportunities and automate smart contract interactions. This project showcased my skills in smart contract development and enhanced my understanding of DeFi market dynamics.
